item.title: Android Jetpack Compose Linkify
item.description: Linkify your text with Jetpack Compose Before Jetpack Compose, if you wanted to Linkify all links within a TextView it was quite straightforward. You only needed one line of code: Linkify.addLinks(myTextView, Linkify.EMAIL_ADDRESSES or Linkify.WEB_URLS) But with Compose it’s a different story. No more of this one magic line.
